p: The direct smoke exposure and hospitalization is generally recognized by the society, as well as the direct loss of property. Such a dramatic and frightening conflagration also has considerable psychological effects, to which each person may react differently. All are marked for life, and some may not be able to resume regular work for years. There was no crisis fund to help the society regain balance afterwards. This added to the stress of the locals and the community administration.
